summary: A replacer of the Initiate found in the Dawnstar Sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[img]https://s15.postimg.cc/htd126maz/Untitled_design_2.png[/img]﻿﻿﻿

[img]https://s15.postimg.cc/51yuvqpej/20180901210316_1.jpg[/img]﻿

[img]https://s15.postimg.cc/6h0fkmb3v/Untitled_design_3.png[/img]﻿
[size=3][color=#f4cccc][b]Q: I'm experiencing something worse than an Emperor's death.. a neck seam. A BAD one!!
[/b][/color]
[color=#e06666]A: Chill. Although, sure, they can be pesky, it's pretty easy to solve! ;D

type 'setnpcweight 70' while the Initiate is clicked on, then 'disable' and 'enable'. 

Her seam should be less intense :)

[/color][/size][color=#f4cccc][b]Q: Okay, I'm using a mod that overwrites this one's edit. [/b]
[/color]
[color=#e06666]A: Boot up the mod you don't want to use (probably the other one as this edits just one NPC) and delete the initiate from the NPC column thingie. Save the .esp aaaaand done!


[size=4]Okay.. now, to apologise for telling you to chill when there was a seam, I've given you the opportunity to post images.

[b][u]Go crazy!
[/u][/b][/size]
[img]https://s15.postimg.cc/j4y3w8xbv/Capture.png[/img]

[/color][/center][color=#ea9999]
[/color]
author: Raye
